bug.author: lkmokadam
bug.summary: Error on using hvd.mpi_threads_supported() error: undefined symbol: mpi_threads_supported
bug.description: Error on using hvd.mpi_threads_supported() error: undefined symbol: mpi_threads_supported mpi_threads_supported = MPI_COMMON_LIB_CTYPES.mpi_threads_supported() should be mpi_threads_supported = MPI_COMMON_LIB_CTYPES.horovod_mpi_threads_supported()

comments.comment: Thanks for the report and the fix!
